ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By the night when it conceals
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL THE night to witness when it covers over,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By the night when it enshrouds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: By the night when it covers the day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By oath of the night when it covers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By the night as it envelops.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I swear by the night when it draws a veil,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: By the night as it veils [the earth] in darkness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the night when it envelopeth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By the night when it envelops,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the Night as it conceals (the light);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By the night as it envelops;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By the night, when it envelops,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: By the night as it covers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: By the night when it covers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:1] By the night as it enshrouds, with its darkness all that is between the heaven and the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying: (By the night enshrouding): '(By the night enshrouding) He says: Allah swears by the night when it enshrouds the light of day.
